doc.field: Account book for construction of buildings on Pineapple Street, Brooklyn
Account book for construction of buildings on Pineapple Street, Brooklyn

One account book, kept by an unnamed construction company, relating to the construction of buildings at #60 and #62 Pineapple Street in Brooklyn during the period 1884 to 1886. The book details estimates and transactions in accounts held with various sub-contractors and suppliers. An index of company names is included.

One account book, kept by an unnamed construction company, relating to the construction of buildings at #60 and #62 Pineapple Street in Brooklyn during the period 1884 to 1886. The book details estimates and transactions in accounts held with various sub-contractors and suppliers. An index of company names is included.
Gift of Ruth McGovern, date unknown. The collection was formally accessioned in 1973.
